snippet: LINTON--Robert. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Robert Linton, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Robert's beloved wife, Margot Tishman; his sister, Marion Benson; his children, Roberta Bennett, Thomas, Jeffrey, and Elizabeth; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: LINTON--Robert. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Robert Linton, who leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Robert's beloved wife, Margot Tishman; his sister, Marion Benson; his children, Roberta Bennett, Thomas, Jeffrey, and Elizabeth; his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
